title: Encounter
creator_credit: Dept of Agriculture, Vic and Victoria. Ministry of Aboriginal Affairs
brief_description: Lake Tyers was the site of a ten day multi-cultural camp for boys. Under the watchful eyes of voluntary skilled instructors the boys swam, sailed, canoed, scuba-dived, went hiking, fishing and played the residents at cricket. They made friends and learned teamwork and co-operation. Narrated by David Johnson.
